app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Filmatico
app_description: As shooting film is truly a magical way to capture moments we recreated this experience with the most realistic approach. The design of a classic film camera along with a traditional shutter sound helps users immerse themselves in the world of analog photography and makes the process of taking photos more captivating and fun. As for our filter among its features are unique film texture and warm vivid colors the famous details that we love about analog photography. You can also add special effects such as random burns light leaks and scratches making your photos look even more vintage. The Filmatico app is for die hard film enthusiasts regular fans of analog photography and those who are not satisfied with ordinary digital snaps. There is no need to waste your time editing photos anymore. Just enjoy our vision of film photography with Filmatico. Nothing will ever replace film but here we try...
